content.rendered:
Our Artiste Range is the sensual, artisanal addition to our catalogue that is sure to find favour among those who demand aesthetic brilliance at an attractive price.

The HAUS armchair is one of most popular styles of armchair. The HAUS is a contemporary chair, ideal for hotels, bars, lounges and offices as well as any other commercial venue. The HAUS is sure to stand out with its linear arms and its comfortable seat and backrest. 

Available in a wide selection of faux leathers, fabrics or any other material (see below). The HAUS is lovingly handmade and available in a wide range of finishes.

There is no minimum order on this item, however the more you buy, the cheaper the items and carriage will be on a pro-rata basis.

As these items are made to order you can customise this to suit your needs.

We suggest using ‘Panaz’ as standard for material. If you’d rather choose your own fabric please select from the materials below & call or email us. (COM – Customers Own Material).

Please click on the below links to view the fabric selection from Panaz:

– Panaz Marna Weave

– Panaz Luxe Velvet

– Panaz Aston Faux

We’d be happy to send you free material samples.

This item has a 1 year warranty. 

The HAUS has visible upholstery through the backrest frame.

The HAUS is similar to our Kaso range of soft seating. The HAUS does not have a minimum order and has a quicker lead time than the Kaso. For more information, please get in touch and we’ll be happy to help.
